segments.text: Observing this kitchen, it's a typical domestic setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink has water running, filling up the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing now, water on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed yet, one foot in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, a boy is on a step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the open cookie jar cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool seems a bit unsteady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, hand extended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sharing a secretive moment with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a neat garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Light filters in, highlighting the counters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked cleanly on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR
